TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Route extends System.Web.Routing.RouteBase

summary.span: 提供用于定义路由及获取路由相关信息的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for defining a route and for obtaining information about the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你可以指定如何在 ASP.NET 应用程序中处理路由。The class enables you to specify how routing is processed in an ASP.NET application. 你为要映射到的每个 URL 模式创建一个对象, 该对象可以处理与该模式对应的请求。You create a object for each URL pattern that you want to map to a class that can handle requests that correspond to that pattern. 然后, 将路由添加到集合。You then add the route to the collection. 当应用程序收到请求时, ASP.NET 路由会循环访问集合中的路由, 以查找第一个与 URL 模式匹配的路由。When the application receives a request, ASP.NET routing iterates through the routes in the collection to find the first route that matches the pattern of the URL. 将属性设置为 URL 模式。Set the property to a URL pattern. URL 模式由传入 HTTP 请求中的应用程序名称后面的段组成。The URL pattern consists of segments that come after the application name in an HTTP request. 例如, 在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`中, 模式`products/show/beverages`适用于。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`, the pattern applies to `products/show/beverages`. 具有三个段 (如`{controller}/{action}/{id}`) 的模式与 URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`匹配。A pattern with three segments, such as `{controller}/{action}/{id}`, matches the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`. 每个段均由`/`字符分隔。Each segment is delimited by the `/` character. 当段括在大括号 (`{`和`}`) 中时, 段被称为 URL 参数。When a segment is enclosed in braces (`{` and `}`), the segment is referred to a URL parameter. ASP.NET 路由从请求中检索值并将其分配给 URL 参数。ASP.NET routing retrieves the value from the request and assigns it to the URL parameter. 在上面的示例中, 将为`action` URL 参数分配值`show`。In the previous example, the URL parameter `action` is assigned the value `show`. 如果段未括在大括号中, 则该值将被视为文本值。If the segment is not enclosed in braces, the value is treated as a literal value. 将属性设置为一个对象, 该对象包含在 url 缺少参数时使用的值, 或者设置未在 url 中参数化的其他值。 Set the property to a object that includes values that are used if a parameter is missing from the URL or to set additional values that are not parameterized in the URL. 将属性设置为包含正则表达式或对象的值的对象。 Set the property to a object that contains values that are either regular expressions or objects. 这些值用于确定参数值是否有效。These values are used to determine whether a parameter value is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象并将其添加到属性。The following example shows how to create a object and add it to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表达式字典，用于指定 URL 参数的有效值。

span.span: Gets or sets a dictionary of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.

value.span: 包含参数名称和表达式的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以限制路由处理的 URL 参数的可接受值。The property enables you to limit acceptable values for a URL parameter that is processed by a route. 将对象分配给属性。You assign a object to the property. 对象中的每个元素都包含参数的名称和以下各项之一:Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and one of the following: - 定义正则表达式的字符串。A string that defines a regular expression. 正则表达式不区分大小写。The regular expression is case-insensitive. - 一个实现接口并包含方法的对象。An object that implements the interface and that includes a method. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 可以将类的实例作为约束包括在内, 以指定路由可接受的 HTTP 谓词。You can include an instance of the class as a constraint to specify which HTTP verbs are acceptable for the route. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象并设置、 和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示一个 对象, 该对象的属性包含`httpMethod`一个名为的参数 , 该参数的值为类的实例。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter named `httpMethod` with an instance of the class for the value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置传递到路由处理程序但未用于确定该路由是否匹配 URL 模式的自定义值。

span.span: Gets or sets custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a URL pattern.

value.span: 一个包含自定义值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains custom values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可检索或分配与路由关联的值, 这些值不用于确定路由是否匹配 URL 模式。You use the property to retrieve or assign values associated with the route that are not used to determine whether a route matches a URL pattern. 这些值会传递到路由处理程序，以便用于处理请求。These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象并设置、 和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 URL 不包含所有参数时使用的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.

value.span: 一个包含参数名称和默认值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以设置 url 参数的值 (如果 url 不包含该参数的段)。The property enables you to set the value for a URL parameter if the URL does not contain a segment for that parameter. 将对象分配给属性。You assign a object to the property. 对象中的每个元素都包含参数的名称, 以及参数缺少时要使用的值。Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and the value to use if the parameter is missing. 可以为未在属性中定义为段的参数包含默认值。You can include a default value for a parameter that is not defined in the property as a segment. 当 ASP.NET 路由处理请求时, 此默认值始终传递到路由处理程序。When ASP.NET routing handles a request, this default value is always passed to the route handler. 构造 URL 时, 如果为未定义为段的默认参数包含值, 则仅当所提供的值与路由的默认值匹配时, 才将路由视为匹配项。When you construct a URL and you include a value for a default parameter that is not defined as a segment, the route will only be considered a match if the value that you provided matches the default value for the route. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象并设置、 和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示一个 对象, 该对象的属性包含一个参数, 该参数不属于属性中的模式。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter that is not part of the pattern in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Url { get; set; }
.property instance string Url
Public Property Url As String
public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置路由的 URL 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL pattern for the route.

value.span: 用于匹配路由和 URL 的模式。

span.span: The pattern for matching the route to a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将值分配给属性时`/` , 在分析 URL 时, 字符被解释为分隔符。When you assign a value to the property, the `/` character is interpreted as a delimiter when the URL is parsed. 使用大括号`{}`() 可定义称为*URL 参数*的变量。Use braces (`{}`) to define a variable that is referred to as a *URL parameter*. 将 URL 中的匹配段的值分配给 URL 参数。The value from the matching segment in the URL is assigned to the URL parameter. 未括在大括号中的属性中的任何值都将被视为文本常量。Any values in the property that are not enclosed in braces are treated as literal constants. 不`?` 允许在属性中使用该字符。The `?` character is not allowed in the property. 必须通过分隔符或文本常量分隔每个 URL 段。Each URL segment must be separated by either a delimiter or literal constant. 可以将`{{`或`}}`用作大括号字符的转义符。You can use `{{` or `}}` as escape characters for a brace character. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在类构造函数中设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property in the class constructor. 模式包含第一个段的文本值 "Category" 和接下来的两个段的 URL 参数。The pattern contains the literal value "Category" for the first segment and URL parameters for the next two segments. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

span.span: Any of the following:

exception.span: - 以 ~ 或 / 开头的值。

span.span: - The value starts with ~ or /.
- The value contains a ?
character.
- The catch-all parameter is not last.
